department: Public Works and Government Services/Public Service and Procurement Canada
short_summary: This procurement is to establish a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for the supply of Utility Terrain Vehicles (UTV’s) to departments and agencies of the Government of Canada. The total expected value call for bids for up to 5 years, from 2023-2028.
description: The National Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business was implemented to promote Indigenous participation in the procurement process. This opportunity will be available to Indigenous businesses through the Standing Offer Authority’s, Indigenous suppliers will be able to submit bids. This contract allows for the delivery of vehicles to locations across Canada for up to five years, from 2023 to 2028.
tags: Public Works and Government Service/Public Service and Procurement Canada

full_summary:
### Request for Standing Offer for Utility Terrain Vehicles

#### Procurement Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors to submit a Request for Standing Offer for Utility Terrain Vehicles (UTVs). The procurement is set aside for Indigenous Businesses under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.

##### Notice Details

*   **Reference Number:** WS3707267907
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3707267907
*   **Publication Date:** January 6, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** February 10, 2023, at 2:00 pm (EST)
*   **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15064697?extsite=MTUwNjQ2OTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Procurement Description

This requirement aims to establish a National Master Standing Offer for the supply of UTVs to departments and agencies of the Government of Canada and Provincial/Territorial Identified Users. The procurement is for a period of up to five years, with deliveries to locations across Canada.

### Amendments

Please note that the tender closing date has been amended. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions should be submitted by February 10, 2023, at 2:00 pm (EST).

### Evaluation Criteria

The standing offers will be evaluated on the basis of price. 

### Debriefings

After issuing a standing offer, offerors may request a debriefing on the results of the request for standing offers process. Offerors should make the request within 15 working days of receipt of the results of the request for standing offers process.

### Contact Information

*   **Name:** Dustin Levere (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email:** [dustin.levere@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:dustin.levere@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Phone:** N/A

### Additional Information

The procurement notice is available on Ariba Discovery and Buyandsell. The Government of Canada may amend or cancel the procurement notice at any time.

Note: The rewritten entry is condensed and reformatted to better adher to the typical style of government tender announcements.
